channel.title: Hugo on Ben Mask
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Ben Mask

item.title: Getting Started with Hugo & GitHub Pages
item.description: Big Idea The goal of this post is to capture the steps required to get started with Hugo and GitHub Pages. Hugo is a Go-based static site generation tool. GitHub Pages is a feature of GitHub that allows anyone with a GitHub account to host a static site. Part 1: Setting up GitHub Pages In order to serve your site, you will need somewhere to host it. GitHub offers a free service called GitHub Pages that we will use for this purpose.
